overview: “Reverb Junkies” is a high-energy feature film documenting the current surf music scene in southern California. “Reverb Junkies” takes you inside this little known sub-genre of Rock and Roll. This documentary introduces you to some of the people playing the fastest, hottest instrumental music around and to the rabid fans of all ages who are driven to keep the music alive.
tagline: "There will always be surf music despite what Jimi Hendrix once said'
title: Reverb Junkies
